properties.Name: EnvironmentalParameter
properties.Description:
An environmental parameter that is used for planning the optimum environmental conditions associated with a process and measuring the actual environmental parameters.

Ex:
- Temperature
- Humidity
- Altitude
- Barometric Pressure
- Contamination Particles
- Air Pressure
- Precipitation
- Wind Speed

Columns.Name: EnvironmentalParameterId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Environmental Parameter.

Columns.Name: EnvironmentalParameterName
Columns.Description: The name of an Environmental Parameter.

Columns.Name: EnvironmentalParameterDescription
Columns.Description: The description of an Environmental Parameter.
